评论概述: a bit on the thinner side
评论详情: The Vi’Cotton Hooded Robe has a lovely color and design, and I appreciate that it’s made from real cotton. However, the material is on the thinner side, which makes it less effective as a bathrobe. I was hoping for something more absorbent, like the classic towel material that dries you off efficiently after a shower. The hood is a stylish touch and adds to the overall look of the robe, but I find it doesn’t serve much of a functional purpose as a bathrobe. While it’s soft and lightweight, it feels more like a loungewear piece than a practical bathrobe. If you’re looking for a robe for drying off, this might not be the best choice, but it could work well as a cozy layer for relaxing around the house.
This is a nice robe, the arms fit me well, but I does not close or wrap around me well. I would suggest sizing up for this reason. Otherwise, it’s a soft, lightweight robe. I love the color too!

评论概述: Too small, had to buy bigger
评论详情: Extremely small even for S size. Otherwise good.
A size medium is really a S/M that’s really just a true small. Gave away as a gift.
Nice summer time Robe. Light and soft on the skin.

I love cotton Muslim fabric and this robe utilizes it well. It’s beautiful and even though I’m modeling it in image, I got it for my husband. The robe he currently has is a super thick terry cloth. It’s great, but It’s super hot and humid here in south Fl and a lightweight breathable robe is a good thing to have. This is certainly both of those, but it’s not flimsy. The fiber content has a nice substantial weight to it. I ordered this in the largest size, L-XL. I’m holding it closed in image because I can’t locate the belt (it’s around here somewhere). It did fold over and close well, but not as oversized as expected. Thankfully my husband’s hips are much slimmer than mine. For reference, I’m 5’5,” 165lbs and my hips are 44.” The quality of construction is top notch and I love that it’s hooded. I chose this in the Gray shade and it’s exact to the product’s image. I felt out of all the color selections, this was the most unisex or masculine. But - I’d be thrilled if this gray shade were available in one size larger, I’d happily buy and wear it.

The soft fleece material is incredibly comfortable to the skin. The addition of the hood is a game-changer. It provides extra warmth, especially after getting out of the shower or on colder mornings. It's also great for drying your hair a little longer while you're resting. Despite its plush feel, quick-drying cotton works wonders. I've noticed that the robe doesn't stay damp for long after use, which is great because it's always ready to wear again sooner than expected.  I love that this robe works equally well for both women and men.The sizing is generous and comfortable, making it perfect for everyone in the house to use.
it's a decent cotton robe but on the thin side and a bit shorter than I anticipated.

The bath is lightweight but not sheer. Works well to help with drying and not getting chilled after a shower, without being too toasty either. The material texture is most like soft, medium thickness dish cloth, not what's normally considered fleece, but it is still comfortable to wear against skin. The hood is appropriately sized, reaching my forehead but not covering my eyes.

The Large-X-Large is basically a small. In the product's defense, I didn't really measure myself in comparison to their sizing guide, but expectations of "Large" and "women and men" aren't very realistic. I'm 6'2", ~200lbs, and was hoping to have a lightweight robe for myself. Not even close to fitting me, unless I was trying to be comically suggestive around the house for my wife. I gave it to her, who is lean built at ~5'8" and it's high/mid-thigh on her.  I'd guess the model they used for their pictures is a petite ~5'5" in a Large-X-Large, and that's where the sleeves and bottom fall on her. Fair enough - the material is comfy and light and feels like a luxury spa type robe, so that's good, but just be aware what size to expect before buying.

评论概述: Wonderful 100% Turkish cotton, but size L/XL is way off
评论详情: I received the bathrobe in the Green Patterned in size L/XL.  I have a Turkish cotton towel that I love, so I thought I would try this bathrobe. This bathrobe is the same wonderful, soft, 100% cotton material as my towel. It is not fluffy like some other bathrobes, but it is super cozy and not nearly as bulky.  I am normally a Woman’s size Small, and sometimes order a Medium for extra room. Having read some other reviews, I thought a size L/XL would be my best bet. The L/XL fits just about right on me and is not too big. I would say the L/XL that I received fits more like a Woman’s size S.  The washing instructions say that you are not supposed to put this in the dryer.  The robe I received has a few pulls in it, but they are small.  The belt tie is removable (it is not sewn on). This robe also has two exterior pockets.  PROS: * 100% Cotton made in Turkey * Has pockets * Not bulky  CONS: **** The L/XL is more like a Woman’s size S. * Not supposed to put in the dryer * The robe I received has a few tiny pulls  NEUTRAL: * I would not describe this material as “Fleece”, as indicated in the title. I think the seller should remove “Fleece” from the description to avoid confusion.

评论概述: Appropriate for summer months. Fabric similar to Turkish towel-not fleece.
评论详情: This fabric is similar to a Turkish towel, the description says fleece but its nothing like fleece. Nevertheless, this robe is so very comfortable. It has 2 large pockets. It was just what I was looking for during the hot summer months. Easy to wash and dry.
Has a huge hole in the hood.

评论概述: Very nice, though it runs a little small
评论详情: I have to say I was pleasantly surprised by how attractive this material is. I've had mixed results ordering clothing from Amazon around this budget price point, but the material - at least the green version - looks really nice, like the sort of robe you'd find in a very good boutique hotel.  Unfortunately, as pointed out by other reviewers, this robe does run a little small. I ordered the L-XL size, and while it fits it's not quite large enough to give you that full body hug you really want from a robe. If you want that you should size up. Fortunately my very slight partner has a birthday coming up, so I'm sure she'll appreciate this being added to her stack of gifts.

Both men's and women's soft fleece bathrobes, the Vi'Cotton Hooded Robe provides warmth and coziness for unwinding. This robe is warm and comfortable because it is made of soft fleece, which is ideal for lounging around the house or right after taking a bath. In addition to providing an additional layer of warmth and protection, the hooded design's soft fabric guarantees a comfortable fit against the skin. It provides a flexible fit for a range of body shapes and sizes. This bathrobe is a fantastic option for anyone looking for an opulent and cozy robe because it blends comfort and utility.

The material is soft, lightweight and surprisingly absorbent. I decided not to use a towel and was quickly dry. It wraps completely closed and stays closed without the need for an inner tie or button. The hood covers my head of long hair and doesn't fall off. It keeps my hair back and helps to dry it. Quality robe!

评论概述: Comfortable, natural feel, and beautifully designed.
评论详情: This robe is incredibly comfortable and fits me perfectly! The soft fleece material feels luxurious and cozy, making it perfect for lounging after a shower or bath. I love the natural feel of the fabric, and the hood adds an extra touch of warmth and relaxation. It’s lightweight yet warm, and the quick-dry cotton makes it super practical.
Not true to size, runs very small.  It would fit very short petite person or a child.  For this price, there are plenty of much better options.
Cute robe, lightweight. Nice soft fabric. I don’t feel that the sizing is right however, it’s cut a little on the smaller size for a robe, so I would suggest sizing up.

This is a great robe. Nice pattern. Really really soft and feels good on the skin. My only qualm, which couldn't give it 5 stars, was the placement of the tie loops. It's very high. Rather than near the hip, it more mid-belly. Still works, but not as comfortable to cinch it up and tie tight. Other reviewers commented on the sizing, and agree it runs a lot smaller. If you are a big person, skip over this. Otherwise, it's really nicely made and a good robe.

评论概述: Good robe for men or women.
评论详情: First, the cotton is very soft and durable, but this isn’t like those overly fluffy hotel robes. That might be why some reviewers are calling it thin. It’s not. There’s good heft without being weighty. The length falls near your knees, but like someone else said, get the biggest size you can. Pattern is nice and has a hook for hanging up as well as a very generous belt and hood.

I'm very satisfied with the quality of this robe! Turkish cotton is a really pleasant fabric and I think it perfectly suits the product. I got the beige-ish patterned one and I love it. I generally wear a men's small, but I ordered the L/XL size as I wanted a generous fit. I think the sleeves are 3/4 length. I wish there was a little loop or tie on the inside that holds the robe closed, but the outer tie works alright.

It's a really nice robe, but it's WAAAAY too small. I would suggest getting the largest size available. I got the L/XL & I can normally wear an XL but this wouldn't close. It fit everywhere else. It really is soft & warm & I hate that I can't wear it.
While this is a nice robe, I ordered XL  thinking that it would be like most robes and oversized to fit larger people like me. I'm 6' 1" 250 and I cannot fit in this robe.

I love the modern simplicity of this robe. The medium gray color is very nice neutral. I love the simplicity in the design and lightness that you could wear year round if you wanted. I do think the fabric feels good, but would love for it to be even softer if I could pick one thing to change. That would put it in the luxury spa feel for me. The sizing is about right for a small- medium.

评论概述: Soft and well made but runs small
评论详情: It was VERY soft out of the package, so nice. The seams are finished, so it looks like it will wash well.  I'm a plus size. This would have been useful to wear but the extra large is too small (especially in the arms). Offering a wider range of sized would be useful.

This is the most disappointed I have ever been with an online "clothes" purchase. I know that buying clothes without trying them on can be a hit or miss proposition, but still, there are certain standards with regards to size that I've come to rely on. This bathrobe is WAY outside of those standards. I'm not a small guy, but while my most comfortable size is XXL, I have lots of sweatshirts that are XL. While those are a bit snug, they still fit OK. This was purported to be Man or Woman Size L - XL. When I tried to put it on for the first time I would get one arm in but then as I reached for the other arm behind my back I couldn't find it. I actually thought that maybe it was fastened together in the back to make it smaller for shipping, but it wasn't. When I finally got both arms in it I couldn't pull the front anywhere close to getting the thing to meet together in front. There was a good 12 inch gap between lapels. A robe is supposed to come together in front and be fastened using a tie so that it provides an amount of coverage in case you have little or nothing on underneath. But this one doesn't cover my chest at all.  To verify that it wasn't just me, I asked my wife (size M) to try it on and even for her it just barely came together in the front. I double checked the size on the lapel and it was definitely a L-XL. In addition to that, the material, while soft, was incredibly thin. You can see light through it. When I first looked at the picture of it and read the description, for some reason I envisioned one of those thick luxurious robes you sometimes find in the closets at high end hotels. That may be my problem with incorrect expectations, but this is thinner than my most tattered t-shirts. Not at all what I want from a robe.

I was wondering how it's possible to have a lightweight summer robe that's still "fluffy" like you like your robes, but Vi’Cotton has stuck the landing here for a perfect 10 with their Hooded Robe-Soft Fleece Bathrobe for Women and Men.  The fabric is lightweight and "floaty," but don't mistake that for flimsy - it's also solid.  It's perfect for coming out of the shower nice and damp. It's like a diffuser for evaporative cooling.  Cushy to get into and a nice calming moment in getting ready for bed, or for that transition from morning sleepy-eyes to jack rabbit go, go, go.  I ordered a larger one, and it's nice and roomy, like I like my clothing if I'm forced to wear clothing (and the laws seem to think I do, plus no need to scare the neighbors).  The hood - kind of wondered about that, too, but it's great for passively wicking moisture from a head full of extensions and more (which you don't need to be rubbing if you want your extensions to last).  Air dries itself very nicely after it air dries you.  Mine arrived without any outer wrap, so be sure to check the right selection box if you want it covered up for delivery (such as a gift).  Would make a great gift, but I'll have to order a 2nd one to gift, because mama's keeping this one! LOVE IT!

评论概述: Sizing is Too Small but Nice Robe
评论详情: I am very sad that this robe runs small. I ordered the large/ XL, and it is far too small. You need to have a robe overlap, or it’s basically a long scarf with arms. I love the fabric as I have a lot of Turkish cotton towels that I love to use. The construction is also very well done. The robe itself is great, it just runs way too small. I will hang it in my guest room so my skinnier friends can be happy when they come and visit! I will also note the sleeves are a short three-quarter length. I am tall, but they still feel shorter than a normal three-quarter length rope does. This may or may not bother you. I also feel the belt loops are maybe a little high, but I am tall, so maybe that is why I feel that way. All that said, it is a nice robe, I just can’t wear it. I am waffling between 3 or 4 stars and will give 4 as my guests will be happy.

Received quickly. I was surprised at how lightweight it was. It can fit a male or female. It's a good length (below the knees, but not too long. What I liked the most was that it was comfortably warm without feeling heavy. What I was disappointed with is that there were no 'strings' on the inside to ensure the robe stays together. (I'm finding most men/unisex robes don't seem to have that) It's actually an issue for my husband with any robe that doesn't have those ties. Overall, it's a decent quality and is comforatable.

My wife likes the style with the green design and the white lining on the sleeves and a band below the waist. When the hair is wet the hood id very useful to prevent water droplets falling on the floor. The material is soft. The additional belt is very nice to knot around the robe.  While it could be very well worn by men, my personal preference is only the color beige striped. Price is matching to the quality.
I love this robe for the pool.  It’s super soft and comfortable.  The color is like an emerald green. It meet all expectations and I am very pleased with it.
